Articles.Content:
I\'m taking CAD 1 at my high school currently, and liking it quite a bit.

Anyone else have experience with CAD?
I\'m actually doing CAD 1 at my high school too.
I tend to spend several hours a day using AutoCAD at work... >_>
I took CAD 1 last year at my high school, but then this year they cancelled CAD 2, so I\'m out of luck for that. I did get a licence for Autodesk Inventor from my robotics team, though.
